code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddTaskForm(_ref){let{addTask}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!title)return;const newTask={id:Date.now(),title:title};addTask(newTask);setTitle('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4 flex flex-col md:flex-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add a new task...",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),className:"border border-gray-400 px-4 py-2 rounded-md mb-2 md:mb-0 md:mr-2 w-full md:w-auto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-slate-600 hover:text-[#ffffff] text-white px-4 py-2 rounded-md w-full md:w-auto",children:"Add Task"})]});}export default AddTaskForm;
